text: Uba Sani (born 31 December 1970) is a Nigerian politician and the current senator for Kaduna Central senatorial district of Kaduna State.https://thenationonlineng.net/my-victory-not-accidental == Education == He obtained his Higher National Diploma in mechanical engineering from Kaduna State Polytechnic. == References == Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Politicians from Kaduna State
title: Uba Sani
